searchJob.query: _view=cs_volumes | name as accountName | timeslice by 1d | sum(size_in_bytes) as bytes by org_id, accountname,_timeslice | formatDate(fromMillis(_timeslice),"MM/dd/yyyy") as date | bytes/1024/1024 as size_mb | format("%.2f", size_mb/1024) as size_gb | fields org_id, accountname, date, size_gb

_view=cs_volumes org_id="${org_id}" | name as accountName | timeslice by 1d | sum(size_in_bytes) as bytes by org_id, accountname,_timeslice | formatDate(fromMillis(_timeslice),"MM/dd/yyyy") as date | bytes/1024/1024 as size_mb | format("%.2f", size_mb/1024) as size_gb | fields org_id, accountname, date, size_gb
